post.desc:
If the Hakurei have been yōkai exterminators for a long time, then they definitely have techniques that – in light of the new Gensōkyō – had become "forbidden" because they are very, very lethal to yōkai. With how lazy Reimu is, I wouldn't be surprised if she doesn't even know these techniques exist. She wouldn't need to. The current Gensōkyō doesn't need them.

**Mizuchi** would know, though... is this the real reason why she's so dangerous? She can give yōkai a really, really bad time.
